attributes.action: Replace the plastic lids at fast food chains with environmentally friendly lids.
attributes.additional_details: Just getting people to turn down a straw is a gateway to a more sustainable lifestyle. “It’s a simple step that anybody can take to address the global plastic problem,” Lofflin said. “You use a straw for 10 minutes, and it never goes away.”
attributes.background: We made a step in the right direction... Mcdonalds started using paper straws! We have ways to get yet though so let's continue the movement. No more plastic lids!
